snippet: Witnesses said an enormous orange flash came from the Parchin military site, although Iranian officials denied that the explosion had occurred there.
abstract: Mysterious explosion at or near Parchin military site rocks Tehran, lighting up skies over city; Iranian officials deny explosion had taken place at the military site, where international monitors suspect Iran once tested triggers for potential nuclear weapons.
lead_paragraph: Witnesses said an enormous orange flash came from the Parchin military site, although Iranian officials denied that the explosion had occurred there.

headline.main: Explosion Around Military Site Jolts Tehran, and 2 Are Missing
headline.print_headline: Explosion Around Military Site Jolts Tehran, and 2 Are Missing
